name: Hand and Stone
storyline: You play as a Mercenary — one of those brave enough to venture to places other people are afraid of… at least for a price. Once you find out that someone is more than willing to pay you generously for some old dusty book you realize that you should definitely be the one to find it. Together with allies you venture forth to the Southern regions — wild and dangerous badlands to explore dungeons of an old castle where the book you’re seeking is rumored to be. However, your squad is ambushed along the way. You are the only one who made it out alive. All you need to do now is to get to the ruins, find the book and survive. Or share the fate of your fallen brethren.
summary: You are an adventurer - one of those, who for a price would go in a place everyone avoids. Thus, when you find out that someone would pay a great amount for some old written relic, you would without a second thought go looking for it.
